TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapHeaderHandling extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The SoapHeaderHandling class is used to get, set, write, and read SOAP header content to and from SOAP messages.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public static hidebysig void EnsureHeadersUnderstood(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderCollection headers) cil managed

Docs.param: The that contains the SOAP headers.
Docs.summary: Checks to ensure that the SOAP headers that must be understood have been understood; if not, this method throws an exception.
Docs.exception: A SOAP header that must be understood was not understood.

An array of type that contains the mappings for the SOAP headers.
